room_title: Escape room "Quarantined" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: We had a group of 6 do the Quarantined room and it definitely wasn't your typical escape room. The hour flew by and the added zombie in the rooms definitely added to the intensity. Would highly recommend and look forward to trying the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Quarantined" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Did Quarantine room with other couples and had a great time solving puzzles and running from the zombie and still managed to escape. Great time and well run.

room_title: Escape room "Quarantined" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Pretty fun. Also was with the group that made it with 30 seconds left in Quarantine. Pretty fun would do it again, the players we were grouped with were very nice everyone worked together and the zombie adds some fun and gore.Staff was helpful with some clues, good time!!!

room_title: Escape room "Quarantined" by Legendary Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: We visited the Quarantine room last night with our group of 8, joined 4 others and completed all challenges with 30 seconds left. We thought we hadn't done very well only to learn we were only the 3rd team to complete the challenges and escape the room in a while! Great job guys!
